text: Markus Mader (born 21 May 1968) is a former Austrian football player and manager of SC Austria Lustenau. ==Career== Mader played for different clubs in Vorarlberg. With IG Bregenz/Dornbirn he played in the Second League. After the end of his player career he became manager of different clubs in Vorarlberg. In the 2017/18 season he became coach of FC Dornbirn in the Regionalliga. They were promoted in 2019 to the Second League. In 2019–20 they finished 12th, and in 2020–21 they finished 7th. For the 2021–22 season he became coach of Austria Lustenau. They won the league and were promoted to the Austrian Bundesliga. ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Austrian footballers Category:Austrian football managers Category:Living people
title: Markus Mader
